mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_ID, c.first_name, c.last_name, c.address, c.phone_number, c.email, cc.credit_card_id, cc.customer_id, cc.credit_card_number, cc.expiry_date AS credit_expiry_date, cc.credit_limit, cc.outstanding_balance, dc.debit_card_id, dc.customer_id, dc.debit_card_number, dc.expiry_date AS debit_expiry_date, l.loan_id, l.customer_id, l.loan_type, l.loan_amount, l.interest_rate, l.start_date, l.end_date, a.account_id, a.account_type, a.balance, a.open_date, a.last_transaction_date, a.branch_id FROM customers c LEFT JOIN credit_cards cc ON c.customer_ID = cc.customer_id LEFT JOIN debit_cards dc ON c.customer_ID = dc.customer_id LEFT JOIN loans l ON c.customer_ID = l.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_holders ah ON c.customer_id = ah.customer_id LEFT JOIN accounts a ON ah.account_id = a.account_id WHERE c.customer_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT c.customer_ID, c.first_name, c.last_name, c.address, c.phone_number, c.email, cc.credit_card_id, cc.customer_id, cc.credit_card_number, cc.expiry_date AS credit_expiry_date, cc.credit_limit, cc.outstanding_balance, dc.debit_card_id, dc.customer_id, dc.debit_card_number, dc.expiry_date AS debit_expiry_date, l.loan_id, l.customer_id, l.loan_type, l.loan_amount, l.interest_rate, l.start_date, l.end_date, a.account_id, a.account_type, a.balance, a.open_date, a.last_transaction_date, a.branch_id FROM customers c LEFT JOIN credit_cards cc ON c.customer_ID = cc.customer_id LEFT JOIN debit_cards dc ON c.customer_ID = dc.customer_id LEFT JOIN loans l ON c.customer_ID = l.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_holders ah ON c.customer_id = ah.customer_id LEFT JOIN accounts a ON ah.account_id = a.account_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (customer_ID, first_name, last_Name, address, phone_number, email) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email})
